FuncDef: The display l2tp-user urpf discard statistics command displays the number of URPF-dropped L2TP user packets.
CLIs: display l2tp-user urpf discard statistics [ ipv4 | ipv6 ] [ slot <slot-id> ]

ParaDef.Info:
Slot ID of an interface board that is in position.
-

Examples: Slot   IPv4 discard packets (high, low)   IPv6 discard packets (high, low)
ExtraInfo: After IPv4 or IPv6 URPF strict check is enabled in the virtual template view, a user can run the display l2tp-user urpf discard statistics command to view the number of IPv4 or IPv6 URPF-dropped L2TP user packets so that a user can check whether packets of incorrect source IPv4 addresses or source IPv6 addresses are sent.
